program_title: Electric Infrastructure Loan and Loan Guarantee Program
program_purpose: The Electric Infrastructure Loan and Loan Guarantee Program finances the construction of electric facilities and improvements to electric service in rural areas.
eligible_applicants_description: Electric distribution, generation, and transmission providers serving rural areas, including:
eligible_applicant_4: For-profit businesses (must be a corporation or limited liability company)
funds_use_description: Funds can be used to finance electric facility construction and improvement, including:
funds_use_4: Replacement of distribution, sub transmission, and headquarters (service, warehouse) facilities
gfr_contact_info: Contact the GFR in your area.
oloa_contact_info: Contact the Rural Electric Program's Office of Loan Origination and Approval (OLOA).
governing_rule_2_name: The Rural Electrification Act of 1936, as amended in 7 U.S.C. 901
application_process_step_2: We encourage you to contact your General Field Representative (GFR) to begin the application process.
note_general_advice: Because information changes, always consult official program instructions or contact your local USDA Rural Development office for help.
equal_opportunity_statement: USDA is an equal opportunity provider, employer, and lender.
